=Functions=

*[echo echo(string)]* _输出文本_

*[die die(string)]* _输出文本后结束_

*[isset isset(object)]* _判断对象是否为空_

*[isNumber isNumber(object)]* _判断对象是否为数字_

*[locationHref locationHref(url)]* _跳转页面_

*[locationReferer locationReferer()]* _返回来源页_

*[alertRedirect alertRedirect(string,url)]* _弹出信息后跳转_

*[alertBack alertBack(string)]* _弹出信息后返回_

*[alertClose alertClose(string)]* _弹出信息后关闭_

*[IIf IIf(flag,return1,return2)]* _三元表达式_
